headline: Whaley in Van Wert…
sentences:
Scott Truxell/Van Wert independent
Copyright © 2010-2022 The Van Wert Independent — Subscribe to our RSS feed — Web Site Design by J. DeWert Enterprises, LLC
Democratic gubernatorial candidate Nan Whaley (center) visited with Van Wert County Democrats during a campaign stop in downtown Van Wert on Saturday.
Whaley is running against John Cranley in the primary election and the winner will appear on the November ballot.
The former Dayton mayor also made stops in Mercer and Paulding counties.
